references: R. K. Guy, Unsolved Problems in Number Theory, E26.
links: Eric M. Schmidt, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
Achim Flammenkamp, Lange Perioden in Subtraktions-Spielen, Dissertation, Dept. Math., University of Bielefeld, Germany.
prog: (Sage)def A014587(max) :....res = []....fact = [1]....while fact[-1] <= max : fact.append(factorial(len(fact)))....for i in xrange(max+1) :........moves = list({res[i-f] for f in fact if f <= i})........k = len(moves)........mex = next((j for j in xrange(k) if moves[j] != j), k)........res.append(mex)....return resend # _Eric M. Schmidt_, Jul 20 2013
author: Achim Flammenkamp (achim(AT)HRZ.Uni-Bielefeld.DE)
